name: egao
description: A CSS library to create kaomoji.

scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:css
scripts.build:css: postcss src/main.css -o dist/egao.css && npm run sync-docs-css
scripts.watch:css: onchange "src/main.css" "src/**/*.ts" -- "npm run build:css && npm run sync-docs-css && npm run sync-docs-data"
scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others "npm run docs:dev" --kill-others "tsc --watch" --kill-others "npm run watch:css"
scripts.docs:dev: npm run build && cd website && npm start
